Digital Garden

Nov 8, 2020 • Duy Dang-Pham

Digital gardens - a new form of blogging (source: MIT Technology Review) which focuses on “what you want to cultivate over time.”

Duy Dang-Pham (Đặng Phạm Thiên Duy) is an academic at RMIT University. His expertise focuses on information security management and digital transformation.
